title: reverse shell
extract: It is surprising that the number of folks that don't actually know what a reverse shell is. Long story short, it is when one computer connects to another computer but the initiating computer forwards their shell to the destination. It is commonplace that a reverse shell happens during an attack or as part of a pentest.Aug 26, 2017
